entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: White House coronavirus task force members like Dr. Fauci are prohibited from testifying before Congress this month under new guidance issued by the Trump administration today. They were instructed not to accept invitations to participate in the hearings. https://t.co/wtKpDeC4Qw
